attributes.action: Teaching Self Love Awareness Lessons in all Uk Nurseries and Schools lessons in all uk nurseries and schools
attributes.additional_details: We can take true responsibility to teach our children, our future generations to respect and love themselves and to understand and realise the dynamic effect that this has on peace within each of us on an individually, peace with in our communities and peace for this beautiful world that we live in.  It is up to each of us to show children the way and this begins with teaching them to LOVE THEMSELVES for exactly who they are. Introducing them to powerful mirror work techniques, positive affirmations for life and visioning their brightness and their future can change the mindset of generations to come.  Join me laura Topper as I take this petition on an amazing journey to making the changes that we all want to be. it is my intention that the UK government look deeply and willingly into their hearts to place self love awareness lessons in all nurseries and schools..as we give out so it returns. Thank you Laura
